STRESS LITERALLY MAKES YOU SICKER

making a sick person financially comfortable and not living in poverty constantly scrambling to afford basic needs will 100% improve their health and likely cost the system LESS long term

this is targeted oppression of people with disabilities

we are failing our comrades with this. even through the pandemic, people on disability been receiving less than the people on CERB - and Why?

why are sick people being made to suffer even more with financial insecurity and the accompanying stress, fear, constant worry?

ok did a research and yeah, unfortunately, around $1495 CAD is looking like MORE even than the MAX you receive if you are unable to work. average around 1k/month 

and thats IF you even receive it. and after long long long long application and processing times with no income https://t.co/PQRbr9areZ

$1495 CAD is trending bcuz that's how much disabled people get per month, i think. not sure but i know its approx tht

but think about that - that's less than the CERB. and if they get married, it disappears.

how are they ever supposed to have any sort of life or future on that?
